dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 3058 IH: Gateway Arch National Park Designation Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Clay (for himself and Mrs. Wagner) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To redesignate the Jefferson National Expansion Memorial in the State of Missouri as the Gateway Arch National Park.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Gateway Arch National Park Designation Act.

section.header: Designation of Gateway Arch National Park

subsection.text: The Jefferson National Expansion Memorial established under the Act of May 17, 1954 (16 U.S.C. 450jj et seq.), shall be known and designated as the Gateway Arch National Park.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the Jefferson National Expansion Memorial shall be considered to be a reference to the Gateway Arch National Park.
